meanings.definition: A watch worn on the wrist for telling time.
meanings.sent1: She checked the time on her wristwatch during the exam.
meanings.sent2: He received a beautiful wristwatch as a birthday gift.
meanings.sent3: The wristwatch seemed to have a mind of its own, always running a bit fast.
meanings.sent4: Her wristwatch was like a tiny timekeeper on her arm.
meanings.sent5: The wristwatch gleamed in the sunlight, a constant companion on her wrist.

meanings.definition: To wear a wristwatch on the wrist.
meanings.sent1: She would wristwatch every day to keep track of time.
meanings.sent2: He wristwatches even when he doesn't need to know the time.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how he wristwatches even in his dreams.
meanings.sent4: She wristwatches like it's a part of her arm.
meanings.sent5: Wristwatching has become a habit she can't break.
